description: This Kotlin source file defines an Android BottomSheetDialogFragment used for selecting item options such as variants and add-ons in a food delivery app. It includes UI setup, event handling, and validation logic for configuring a menu item before adding or editing it in a cart.

classes.name: ItemOptionsBottomSheet
classes.description: A bottom sheet UI component for selecting variants and add-ons for a menu item, including validation and price calculation.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Initializes the sheet with the menu item, initial selections, and a listener for confirmation actions.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the bottom sheet.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up UI components, binds data, and initializes option views.

methods.name: buildVariantGroupView
methods.description: Creates UI view for a variant group with radio buttons for options.

methods.name: buildAddOnGroupView
methods.description: Creates UI view for an add-on group with checkboxes.

methods.name: buildOptionLabel
methods.description: Creates a display label for an option, including price delta if applicable.

methods.name: buildAddOnHint
methods.description: Generates hint text for add-on groups based on selection constraints.

methods.name: renderPrice
methods.description: Calculates and displays the current total price based on selections.

methods.name: onConfirm
methods.description: Validates user selections and notifies listener with configuration details.
